Description


A 4K x265/HEVC Player is a REQUIREMENT for this Torrent!
 If you want the OLD format that works with all the OLD kit, get the x264 version.

Seriously, if you don't have 4K set up, why are you downloading this?

image

 Encoded using the time consuming 2 pass, in 10bit color, from the 4K Web-Rip source, for the highest quality possible.
Note: TrollUHD had sync issues with ep4 & ep 10. No 4K alt available, I encoded at my highest 1080p settings
